WorkItem.Description:
I am experiencing some issues when trying to use compile on save after grouping my .js file underneath the .ts file. Compile on save stops working after I do so.

Initially I thought that grouping the files together was the issue but it appears to be related to unloading / reloading the project.

If I close / re-open visual studio it starts working again until I unload / reload the project.

**Steps to reproduce**

 - Enable compile on save

 - Open both files (.ts and .js)

 - Confirm compile on save works by saving a change to the .ts file. You will be notified to reload the .js file.

 - Unload project

 - Reload project

 - Save a change to the .ts file. You will not be prompted to reload the .js file. Notice that the .js file does not pick up any changes in the .ts file now.
